titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Radiology Department - Description

body.p: A Radiology Department is a Department .

A Radiology Department Â is a unit based in one or more LOCATIONS which is managed as a separate entity by a CONSULTANT or non-medical scientist of equivalent standing in the MAIN SPECIALTY of radiology which deals with requests for radiological or isotope procedures.
A Radiology Department may perform Imaging or Radiodiagnostic Events and provide radiology CLINICAL INVESTIGATION RESULT ITEMS .
